org.opendaylight.controller.sample.l2switch.md.flow

Class FlowWriterServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.sample.l2switch.md.flow.FlowWriterServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FlowWriterService

    public class FlowWriterServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements FlowWriterService
    Implementation of FlowWriterServiceFlowWriterService, that builds required flow and writes to configuration data store using provided DataBrokerService DataBrokerService

    • Method Detail

      • addMacToMacFlow

        public void addMacToMacFlow(org.opendaylight.yang.gen.v1.urn.ietf.params.xml.ns.yang.ietf.yang.types.rev100924.MacAddress sourceMac,
                   org.opendaylight.yang.gen.v1.urn.ietf.params.xml.ns.yang.ietf.yang.types.rev100924.MacAddress destMac,
                   NodeConnectorRef destNodeConnectorRef)
        Writes a flow that forwards packets to destPort if destination mac in packet is destMac and source Mac in packet is sourceMac. If sourceMac is null then flow would not set any source mac, resulting in all packets with destMac being forwarded to destPort.
        Specified by:
        addMacToMacFlow in interface FlowWriterService
        Parameters:
        sourceMac -
        destMac -
        destNodeConnectorRef -

      • addMacToMacFlowsUsingShortestPath

        public void addMacToMacFlowsUsingShortestPath(org.opendaylight.yang.gen.v1.urn.ietf.params.xml.ns.yang.ietf.yang.types.rev100924.MacAddress sourceMac,
                                     NodeConnectorRef sourceNodeConnectorRef,
                                     org.opendaylight.yang.gen.v1.urn.ietf.params.xml.ns.yang.ietf.yang.types.rev100924.MacAddress destMac,
                                     NodeConnectorRef destNodeConnectorRef)
        Writes mac-to-mac flow on all ports that are in the path between given source and destination ports. It uses path provided by NetworkGraphService NetworkGraphService to find a links Link between given ports. And then writes appropriate flow on each port that is covered in that path.
        Specified by:
        addMacToMacFlowsUsingShortestPath in interface FlowWriterService
        Parameters:
        sourceMac -
        sourceNodeConnectorRef -
        destMac -
        destNodeConnectorRef -
